title: About health, happiness, labor and money
description: Throughout 2005 - 2015, T.N. Mickushina has received the Messages from the Masters of Wisdom by using a special method. This harmonious and all-embracing Teaching affects all spheres of human life. The book contains the Messages and the fragments of the Messages on current and understandable topics such as health, happiness, labor, and money. This book is aimed at readers already familiar with the basics of esoteric knowledge.
author: Tatyana N. Mickushina
